question: Which country houses the National Marine Park of Alonnisos Northern Sporades?
explanation: The National Marine Park of Alonnisos Northern Sporades is an IUCN category II national park founded on May 16, 1992. It was the first of its kind in Greece and is currently the largest marine protected area in Europe. It is located in the region of the Northern Sporades islands, in the northern Aegean Sea.
